name: Premium Package
description: Package includes 100 development hours and technical support during verification period.

name: Standard Package
description: Package includes 70 development hours and technical support during verification period.

name: Basic Package
description: Package includes 40 development hours and technical support during verification period.

name: Consultation Service
description: Consultation Service (per hour) to plan and estimate cost for your project. During promotion time, ask for complimentary consultation (up to 2 hours).
